text_block_list.text: —This is Tracen Academy.

Many promising Umamusume gather here, 
running for the "Twinkle Series", the 
glorious stage they all long for…

They spend their days in friendly 
competition, learning with friends, 
training body and mind…
… However—

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Crisis ！！！！！

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It caaan't go on like this… ！！！！

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: What's going on, director?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Tazuna! As the director of Tracen Academy, 
loving Umamusume with all my heart…

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Concern! I'm very concerned about
the current situation, where they
can't fully display their shining
individuality!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: That! Is! Why!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Proposal! I'm planning to 
organize a new race!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: What? A- A new race …!?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Affirmation! Beyond the Twinkle 
Series they all aspire to!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I'm creating a new big race, with 
all distances and all courses!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It's called—

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: URA Finals!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: URA… Finals…!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Come on, Tazuna, let's get busy!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Without delay! Get ready for the press 
conference to share this great news!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Director …!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: —Yes, ma'am. I'll make the arrangements!

… This is how the new race — 
URA Finals — was conceived.

This race was set up as a stage for 
all kinds of Umamusume to shine.

The story of you and your 
Umamusume begins now!

The story of you and your 
Umamusume begins now!
